pr_title: HDDS-3178. Add unit tests for OMGetDelegationToken Request and Response

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to set the secretManager again? OzoneManager.getDelegationTokenMgr is going to return the same object again.
timeline.author: hanishakoneru

replies.bodyText:
Thank you @hanishakoneru for the review.
Yes, we don't need secretManager here.
Updated.
replies.author: cxorm

timeline.message: Add unit tests for OMGetDelegationToken Request and Response
